info.title: Defect Code and Code Group - Read
info.description: This service is related to the business object Defect. The combination of defect code group and code uniquely identifies the type of the defect in Quality Management in a coded format.

x-sap-shortText: Read defect codes and code groups and their language-dependent texts using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Quality Notification and Defect Processing Integration(SAP_COM_0153)
[Quality Management in Discrete Manufacturing(1E1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1E1 " Link To BP ")
[Quality Management in Stock Handling(1MR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MR " Link To BP ")

get.description: Reads all defect codes with their code groups and the information whether a code is inactive and the code group is usable.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_DefectCode HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
